post:
We are here to offer you a great deal on our high quality VPS servers. We give you friendly, personal customer support. We try to know you by name. Whatever it is, we will do our best to satisfy your needs.

We own all of our servers and other equipment. We are hosted in Durham, NC in one of Tierpont's many tier III data centers.

24/7 monitoring system, 24/7 Support

Feel free to ask any questions here or email us at Sales@LittleCreekHosting.com

All virtual machines come with the below:
1 IPv4 addresses
No setup fees
Free reinstalls
99.99% uptime SLA
24/7 on-site technical support
Full remote management and control (VNC access, reboot, reinstall, bandwidth check, etc.)
No long-term contract. Monthly payments and you can cancel at any time.
Payments by credit/debit cards, Paypal
DirectAdmin Included (Please select it when purchasing)

These prices are not advertised anywhere on our web site. These deals have been especially created for LET. They can only be accessed from the links below.
